title: Shortbread and Scones
description: Jacob ‘Jack’ Stanton has a gift, one which kept him out of the trenches and landed him an assignment to Section 6. When he’s assigned to work with ex-army Captain turned Scotland Yard detective Charlie Campbell, sparks fly. Jack and Charlie must follow the path of a 175 year old mystery from the streets of London through the Highlands of Scotland before the gold falls into the wrong hands. Can they complete their task with both their lives, and hearts, intact?
author: Nicole Pruett
